health_recipes.name: Salad
instructions: Wash all vegetables thoroughly under running water to remove any dirt or chemicals
Chop 2 cups of lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Dice 1 medium-sized tomato and slice 1 cucumber into thin rounds. Add them to the bowl.

health_recipes.name: Egg Roll
instructions: Beat 2 eggs with 1/4 teaspoon each of salt and black pepper in a bowl.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a pan. Add 2 tablespoons of finely chopped onion
Pour the beaten eggs into the pan and cook until the egg sets (2-3 minutes).

health_recipes.name: Sushi
instructions: Lay out a nori sheet on a bamboo mat.
Use the bamboo mat to tightly roll the nori, forming a cylindrical sushi roll.
Cut the roll into 6-8 pieces with a sharp knife. Serve with soy sauce.

health_recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, 1 tablespoon biryani masala, and salt for 30 minutes.
Boil soaked rice until 80% cooked and drain.
Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 30 minutes. Serve hot.

health_recipes.name: Classic Cheeseburger
instructions: Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the patties
Add a slice of cheese on each patty in the last minute of cooking.
Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, patty, and toppings. Serve warm.

health_recipes.name: Jjajangmyeon
instructions: Boil the noodles as per package instructions and set aside.
Heat oil in a pan and stir-fry pork belly for 2 minutes.
Add potato, zucchini, and onion, cooking for 5-7 minutes until tender.

health_recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons of butter in a pan and sauté 1 chopped onion until golden.
Add 1 tablespoon of ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1 minute.
Finish with 2 tablespoons of fresh cream. Serve with naan or rice.

health_recipes.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook 200 grams of spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in a pan and sauté 5 sliced garlic cloves until golden.
Add 1 teaspoon chili flakes and the cooked spaghetti. Toss well.

health_recipes.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté 2 onions until golden.
Add 2 tablespoons of ginger-garlic paste
Stir in 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1 tablespoon coriander powder
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice or roti.

fast_foods.name: Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta in a large pot of salted water for 8-10 minutes or until al dente
Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Serve hot with optional grated Parmesan cheese.
